DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , single-blind , placebo-controlled , sequential parallel-group multiple ascend dose ( MAD ) study evaluate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics KBP 7072 healthy subject . The safety assess dose level progress next high dose .
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Ascending Dose Study KBP-7072 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject Are age 18 55 year ( inclusive ) ; Body mass index ( BMI ) 19 30 kg/m2 inclusive body weight less 50 kg . Clinically significant history gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , musculoskeletal , endocrine , hematologic , psychiatric , renal , hepatic , bronchopulmonary , neurologic , immunologic , lipid metabolism disorder , drug hypersensitivity ; Known suspect malignancy ; Positive blood screen human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , hepatitis C ( HCV ) antibody ; Positive pregnancy test result .
